TopicTitle: My ship fell apart, and I acciden quicksaved after it - was doing science around Pol.

Articles.Content:
Do I should load my much earlier save, where I was at Eve? Or I should send Starship MK 2 to Pol to rescue Kerbals and science?

42 days in game passed since launch of Starship V1. Also game is waaay smoother after disassembly (was lagging at 150 parts o.o).

Here is current situation (also done 660 various experiments in Kerbol system):

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited June 20, 2014 by raxo2222

How does this have to do with mods?

IMHO, go for a rescue mission. They can really make your day

Having mods installed does not make your question mod related

I also say go for a rescue mission. They're fun. Far more fun than re-doing the same mission over again.

And I feel your feel regarding hitting F5 by accident. Done that one more than once and it's never a good time

Okay I rescued science and kerbals

Also plunged old spaceship into jool
